Text:
I agree.
In addition: What kind of n00b  description is "the best movie". 
If I was the administrator of this site I would delete this upload and ban your ass. Then I would spend 4 hours verbally abusing your mother and file a report to the police. It's obvius that she dropped you on your head when you where a toddler.
If you think that a 5 mb porn movie is the best you've ever seen, you simply do not have the same frame of reference that the rest of us.
